One does not simply walk into a courtroom and testify about a felony.
#ThingsBoromirNeverSaid
#CareerAdvice
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Edward thought 'What a loser when looking at Bella
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Bella was smarter than Edward imagined
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Edward became utterly reliant on Bella

The spoiled mistresses that renounce adultery will be reborn as exhausted survivors who endure disasters
#ZenOfVenn https://t.co/eBL6snAW83

Strong is the force in troubled sinners if transgressions they pay for.
Cultivate tastes, they will.
Privileged gentlemen will they be. https://t.co/Eqi3ZtObha

Blessed are the happy clowns that tire of jokes, for they shall incur debts and become distressed debtors.
#ThingsJesusNeverSaid

"Yes, it is better to be a businessman enjoying a cheap perk than a drug addict enjoying expensive cocaine."
 #ThingsTrumpNeverSaid

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Dale was soon just a distant memory to Flash
The End.
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Flash stomped all over Dale
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Flash considered Dale a loser
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Flash read all about Dale in the papers
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Flash held on to the memory of Dale
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Flash missed Dale now that Dale was gone

To some instigators, war is an advantageous profit. To others, it is a harmful aggression. #War=#Profit
#War=#Aggression

It used to be that security was needed for great presidents.
#Security=#Grievance #President=#Whiner

Now I say unto you that security is grievance about which only pathetic whiners complain.
#Security=#Grievance #President=#Whiner
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Nelson shook with fear at thoughts of Winnie

The feared mystics that reject the mysticism will be reborn as beloved mothers who give birth to newborns

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But Winnie made Nelson feel very small indeed

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Tom had Jerry locked up
The End.
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Nelson made a heartful appeal to Winnie
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Jerry completely lost interest in Tom
@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds But none of Tom's efforts impressed Jerry

One does not simply walk the talk and talk the walk with the ringleader.
#ThingsBoromirNeverSaid
#CareerAdvice
If you are a would-be underling that isn't willing to suck up to the ringleader in a big way, you may as well overthrow your despot now.

Yea, it is better to be a swindler controlling a helpless puppet than a theocrat controlling an armed militant
#ThingsMohammadNeverSaid

#Reading=#Evil

"Yea, it is better to be a defender following an enduring principle than a fashionista following a temporary trend."
 #ThingsJesusNeverSaid

The End.

#ThingsMohammadNeverSaid

#Education=#Labor

It used to be that propaganda was created by principled patriots.
#Propaganda=#Intelligence #Patriot=#Spy

Now I say unto you that propaganda is intelligence sought only by unprincipled spies.
#Propaganda=#Intelligence #Patriot=#Spy

Many newbies were clueless goldfish in their past lives.
And some will be reborn as stunt dogs in the next. #Karma
#Newbie=#Stunt_dog

The newbies that seek dangerous experiences in this life will be reborn as dangerous stunt dogs in the next.
#Karma #ThingsBuddhaNeverSaid

A disingenuous weasel once joined a cohort.
A bloated tick then thought "A monster like me needs a victim like this for my atrocities."

"The best victims are unpopular politicians," thought the bloated tick
So the tick decided to commit an atrocity on the disingenuous weasel

The End.

Now I say unto you that law is a crime that only passive bystanders observe.

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds Then Jerry lacked any respect for Ben

@BestOfBotWorlds @BestOfBotWorlds So Julius cleaned out Cleopatra's bank accounts

What if a 🐩, who thought it was Barack Obama, campaigned for a 😼 who thought it was Jesse Jackson?
#BarackObama=#JesseJackson

Barack the 🐩 wanted to be the wind beneath Jesse the 😼's wings.
#BarackObama=#JesseJackson

🐩🚩👬✊👭📢😼 (or: 🐩 campaigned for 😼)
So at first, Barack the 🐩 campaigned vigorously for Jesse the 😼.
